TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It returns but is sentient and kills you.

I wish for no food for hungry children in Ethiopia. muahaha! (plz dont hate is jsut game)

Granted. They are given AK-47s instead and shown where the person who wished away their food lives.

I wish food could be distributed fairly so no one has to starve.

granted, but now all food is petrol flavoured raisins.

I wish that i could go into spaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaace

Granted!

I wish I was the best Cop on Garry's Mod DarkRP

Granted. But since this is garry's mod it gets weird and you die from a heart attack. (dunno)

I wish Poland was strong and powerful.

Granted. Poland can now into space. Congrats.

*insert picture of Polandball wearing a dunce hat here*

I wish for a Tails doll. (it's a creepypasta)

Granted! It kills you.

I wish I had a pet mudkip.

Granted. It's just a mudkip ball with feet bulging out.

I wish for a collection of real fox tails.

Edited June 18, 2014 by Tery215

Granted. You get a large collection of those annoying plant things called fox tails. They are delivered straight to your eyeballs.

I wish for GavinoFree.

Granted. You get a free Gavino bean (which are totally nonexistent, so you get nothing.)

I wish that I could hear what everyone around me is thinking.

Granted. The translator can only translate thoughts into extreme dubstep, which your mind is now being battered with.

I wish for immunity to extreme dubstep.

Granted. The translator can only translate thoughts into extreme dubstep, which your mind is now being battered with.

I wish for immunity to extreme dubstep.

Granted, However, You can only listen to Super-Hyper-Intense-Extreme Dubstep.

I wish to have all the new TF2 taunts.

Granted. However, they cost $149.99 to use. Each time.

I wish for Watchdogs to actually be a good game.

Granted, but the price skyrockets to $999.99 USD.

I wish for Puppysmiles to be remembered...

Granted, but it gets so much attention that entire governments do nothing but look at puppysmiles, and great nations fall to puppysmiles xD

I wish that MY DANG BROTHER WOULD REMEMBER TO MAKE WAFFLES!!!!!

Granted. The waffles are blue. Huehuehue. #SoPunny2014lel

I wish I didn't make that hashtag.

Granted, but it only never existed in another universe.

I wish for my TOG II* to be faster.

Granted. It's acceleration is also faster and you die from 900 G froce.

I wish for a giant pony.

The giant pony doesn't see you and crush you.

I wish for a self-aware companion robot.

Granted. It is a piece of metal that is aware of its own existence, and soon begins to doubt you.

I wish I had a fire.

Granted. You're fired.

I wish for world peace.

Granted. Every planet has a pea manifestation. I ate the one for earth.

I wish for moar boosters.

Granted. You are inside it, and the fire is very hot.

I wish for Ice Cube ice cubes.

Granted. You are now an ice cube, about to melt in the summer heat.

I wish for rocks.

Granted. You are now an ice cube, about to melt in the summer heat.

I wish for rocks.

Granted, but the rocks are in socks, which have locks.

I wish to be a bee that could see into the sea.
